metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20812 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Setting screen of Server Sync ofMovable Type (Movable Type Advanced 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable TypeAdvanced 7 Series) and Movable Type Premium Advanced 1.44 and earlier)allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary script or HTML via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
